Summary: Red light solid cone shape object flying over Jersey City
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Jersey City
There were no other sightings in Jersey City on or around March 30th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 1:33am I was driving west on Grace Street when I observed a object that was above me. I stopped my car to observe this object, which had a solid red light flyingh slow me. Now there was only one light (unlike a plane, which has blinking lights.) I also noticed that this object was cone shaped (It blocked out a few stars, that is how I seen a shape.) This object seemed to move toward New York City, so I got in my car, went up Grace to Leonard St to Central Avenue to Palisdae Street to Hoboken to follow this object. I lost it on 14st street. It seemed to disappear over the Hudson River.
